title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: It is a simple irony that the voice of dissent can be as vital to a group discussion as is the chorus of those in agreement. And the same is true for any dialogue you are having within yourself. It is important not to turn away from that one note which isnt in tune with all the others when you are deciding what to do next. It can often be the quiet whisper of intuition that spares you from a blunder or nudges you in the right direction. Hear out your inner nonconformist and keep an open mind. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
